subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Denver Coach Mike Shanahan told the rookie Mike Bell that he was the team’s top running back, jumping ahead of Ron Dayne and Tatum Bell. Mike Bell, signed as an undrafted free agent, had entered camp as the fourth-string back but impressed coaches immediately.
